headline: Budweiser Maker Is Teaming Up With Netflix. It Needs a Wider Audience to Boost Slumping Sales.
summary: Amid declining sales of alcoholic beverages, beer giant Anheuser-Busch InBev is partnering with the streaming service to sell more drinks.

headline: Molson Coors Names Rahul Goyal President, CEO
summary: Molson Coors Beverage has designated its chief strategy officer, Rahul Goyal, to succeed Gavin Hattersley as president and chief executive of the brewer, effective Oct. 1.

headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company Board Names Rahul Goyal as President and Chief Executive Officer
summary: CHICAGO, September 22, 2025--Molson Coors Beverage Company ("Molson Coors" or "the company") (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A) today announced that its Board of Directors has unanimously appointed Rahul Goyal, chief strategy officer, to succeed Gavin Hattersley as president and chief executive officer. Rahul will assume the role and become a member of Molson Coors’ Board of Directors effective Oct. 1, 2025. Gavin will remain in an advisory role until the end of 2025 to help ensure a smooth transition.

raw.headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company Board Names Rahul Goyal as President and Chief Executive Officer
raw.summary: CHICAGO, September 22, 2025--Molson Coors Beverage Company ("Molson Coors" or "the company") (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A) today announced that its Board of Directors has unanimously appointed Rahul Goyal, chief strategy officer, to succeed Gavin Hattersley as president and chief executive officer. Rahul will assume the role and become a member of Molson Coors’ Board of Directors effective Oct. 1, 2025. Gavin will remain in an advisory role until the end of 2025 to help ensure a smooth transition.
